All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
CommonHelper
 
Conversion
The Conversion class represents a single number base conversion operation performed by a user within the Number Converter System.
ConverterController
The ConverterController class provides static utility methods for converting numbers between different bases, handling both integer and fractional parts.
FileController
The FileController class provides static utility methods for file-based operations related to number conversion sessions and histories for users.
Main
The Main class serves as the entry point for the Number Converter System application.
QuizController
The QuizController class provides static methods for managing and conducting interactive quizzes related to number base conversions.
QuizQuestion
The QuizQuestion class represents a single question in a number base conversion quiz within the Number Converter System.
StatsController
The StatsController class provides static utility methods for calculating, aggregating, and displaying statistics related to number conversion sessions and histories for users.
User
The User class represents a registered user within the Number Converter System.
UserController
The UserController class provides static utility methods for managing user accounts, authentication, session conversion data, and persistent storage of user information for the Number Converter System.
